data.title: Dan Sallitt’s Favorite Films of the 1970s, by International Release Date
data.meta_description: 1979 THE MARRIAGE OF MARIA BRAUN (Rainer Werner Fassbinder, West Germany) DRUGSTORE ROMANCE (CORPS À COEUR) (Paul Vecchiali, France) MAD MAX (George Miller, Australia) TROUBLE AT NIGHT (Catherine Breillat, France) HEAD OVER HEELS (CHILLY SCENES OF WINTER) (Joan Micklin Silver, USA) LA FEMME QUI PLEURE (Jacques Doillon, France) THE BROOD (David Cronenberg, Canada) LA DRÔLESSE…
